entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 20
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS 10 TO 15
